task: Move Beckhoff machine to (30, 30, 30), where XTB is 24
Ini_1:
1. Set machine structural parameter XTB to 24
2. Enable Y-axis
3. Move X-axis to 30
4. Move Y-axis to 30
5. Move Z-axis to 30
Ini_2:
1. Connect Beckhoff machine, address 192.168.1.100, port 701
2. Enable X-axis
3. Enable Y-axis
4. Enable Z-axis
5. Set machine structural parameter XTB to 24
6. Set X-axis speed to 10
7. Set Y-axis speed to 10
8. Set Z-axis speed to 10
9. Move X-axis to 30
10. Move Y-axis to 30
11. Move Z-axis to 30
Ini_3:
1. Disconnect Simu machine
2. Connect Beckhoff machine, address 192.168.1.100, port 701
3. Enable X-axis
4. Enable Y-axis
5. Enable Z-axis
6. Set machine structural parameter XTB to 24
7. Set X-axis speed to 10
8. Set Y-axis speed to 10
9. Set Z-axis speed to 10
10. Move X-axis to 30
11. Move Y-axis to 30
12. Move Z-axis to 30
Ini_4:
1. Connect Beckhoff machine, address 192.168.1.50, port 851
2. Enable X-axis
3. Enable Y-axis
4. Enable Z-axis
5. Set machine structural parameter XTB to 24
6. Set X-axis speed to 10
7. Set Y-axis speed to 10
8. Set Z-axis speed to 10
9. Move X-axis to 30
10. Move Y-axis to 30
11. Move Z-axis to 30

task: Set RTC6 scanner offsets X, Y, Z to 90, 180, -180 respectively, connect IPG laser, turn on red light and enable
Ini_1:
1. Set scanner offset X to 90
2. Set scanner offset Y to 180
3. Set scanner offset Z to -180
Ini_2:
1. Disconnect Simu scanner
2. Connect RTC6 scanner, control mode 4
3. Set scanner offset X to 90
4. Set scanner offset Y to 180
5. Set scanner offset Z to -180
6. Turn on laser enable
Ini_3:
1. Connect RTC6 scanner, control mode 6
2. Set scanner offset X to 90
3. Set scanner offset Y to 180
4. Set scanner offset Z to -180
5. Disconnect Simu laser
6. Connect IPG laser, serial port COM7
7. Turn on laser red light
8. Turn on laser enable
Ini_4:
1. Connect RTC6 scanner, control mode 4
2. Set scanner offset X to 90
3. Set scanner offset Y to 180
4. Set scanner offset Z to -180

task: Switch to camera coordinate system, and move tool X forward by 10 units
Ini_1:
1. Enable Y-axis
2. Switch to camera coordinate system
3. Move tool X-axis forward by 10
Ini_2:
1. Connect Simu machine, address 192.168.1.100, port 701
2. Enable X-axis
3. Enable Y-axis
4. Enable Z-axis
5. Set X-axis speed to 10
6. Set Y-axis speed to 10
7. Set Z-axis speed to 10
8. Switch to camera coordinate system
9. Move tool X-axis forward by 10
Ini_3:
1. Set Z-axis speed to 10
2. Move tool X-axis forward by 10
Ini_4:
1. Connect Beckhoff machine, address 192.168.1.50, port 851
2. Enable X-axis
3. Enable Y-axis
4. Enable Z-axis
5. Set X-axis speed to 10
6. Set Y-axis speed to 10
7. Set Z-axis speed to 10
8. Move tool X-axis forward by 10

task: Set processing count and contour count to 2 and 4 respectively, start processing
Ini_1:
1. Enable Y-axis
2. Set processing parameter cycle-count to 2
3. Set processing parameter contour-count to 4
4. Start processing
Ini_2:
1. Connect Simu machine, address 192.168.1.100, port 701
2. Enable X-axis
3. Enable Y-axis
4. Enable Z-axis
5. Set X-axis speed to 10
6. Set Y-axis speed to 10
7. Set Z-axis speed to 10
8. Turn on laser enable
9. Enable tool retraction
10. Set processing parameter cycle-count to 2
11. Set processing parameter contour-count to 4
12. Start processing
Ini_3:
1. Set Z-axis speed to 10
2. Connect RTC6 scanner, control mode 6
3. Set processing parameter cycle-count to 2
4. Set processing parameter contour-count to 4
5. Start processing
Ini_4:
1. Connect Beckhoff machine, address 192.168.1.50, port 851
2. Enable X-axis
3. Enable Y-axis
4. Enable Z-axis
5. Set X-axis speed to 10
6. Set Y-axis speed to 10
7. Set Z-axis speed to 10
8. Connect RTC6 scanner, control mode 6
9. Enable tool retraction
10. Set processing parameter cycle-count to 2
11. Set processing parameter contour-count to 4
12. Start processing
